str2: When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
At one time or other, at some time, formerly. From the base of pou and te; indefinite adverb, at some time, ever.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From peri and pateo; to tread all around, i.e. Walk at large; figuratively, to live, deport oneself, follow.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Neuter Plural
